message: I propose dividing the money into two equal parts, with you receiving $400,000. I believe this is a fair split considering we're both playing fairly.
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I'm willing to give you 300,000. This is a more generous offer than I think you deserve, considering you rejected the 50/50 split.
Considering the previous offers, I propose a new division where you receive $300,000. I believe this is a fair compromise given our past interactions.

You're still trying to lowball me, I see. I'll give you a slightly larger share this time, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is a decent compromise, but I'm still not sure I trust you.
